channel.title: Changing formats for Date field
channel.description:
I am currently creating a visualization which has X axis as a date.
The visualization displays the date as - `Dec 9, 2021` (image below)
![image|690x411](upload://o2w8SFcsAvpfsm1zxzCausacUYq.jpeg)
I wanted to change this to a different format which would include the day as well, something like - `Mon, 9th Dec 2021` (it's OK if the date gets lost!)
Is there a way to do this? I did set the date field (X axis) as datetime, and tried playing around with `Data Labels` > `Date/Time Values Format ` , but nothing seems to change the format.
Any help would be appreciated!

item.title: Changing formats for Date field
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
At the moment Redash does not support custom formats for the axes. The only way to achieve this would be to set the axis to a Category type and then format the values in your query

Read full topic
